headline: Data Scientist | AI/ML | DL | NLP | Gen AI | LLM | RAG | LangChain | Computer Vision | Ex-SAP Basis Consultant | SAP S/4HANA Expert | UCLan Grad | Innovator | Seeking Impactful Roles
summary:
Experienced SAP Basis Consultant with a strong track record of delivering excellence in the IT sector, I've successfully managed critical upgrades and system troubleshooting for clients, including SAP-SE (SAP Labs India Pvt Limited), using Development Landscape Management and Service Now tools. I've orchestrated upgrades of a range of SAP products, optimizing performance on both cloud and on-premise platforms.

Recently, I earned my Master's degree in Data Science from the University of Central Lancashire, where I delved into the theoretical and practical realms of statistics, machine learning, deep learning, and computer vision. This academic journey expanded my skills and fueled my passion for tackling complex real-world challenges.

My dedication to continuous learning is unwavering, and I have complemented my formal education with multiple online courses and certifications in data science. I am now poised to channel this knowledge into dynamic data science roles.

As I embark on this new chapter, I'm excited to leverage my strong analytical skills, technical proficiency, and commitment to problem-solving. My goal is to apply data science techniques to drive impactful insights and solutions for organizations. I'm eager to collaborate, learn, and contribute to innovative projects in the data science field.

If you're seeking a data scientist who is not only well-versed in the latest technologies but also possesses a proven ability to adapt and excel, let's connect. Together, we can explore opportunities to harness the power of data for informed decision-making and sustainable growth.

experiences.title: SAP Basis Consultant
experiences.description:
Experienced SAP Basis Consultant with a strong background in the IT sector and services industry, specializing in supporting our esteemed client SAP-SE (SAP Labs India Pvt Limited) through adept utilization of Development Landscape Management (DLM) and Service Now (GLDS) tools.

My expertise spans a wide array of responsibilities, including:

1. SAP Product Upgrades: Proficiently managing upgrades of SAP Netweaver, SRM, CRM, EHP products, SAP HANA, and SAP BASIS, encompassing both On-Premise Release Upgrades and SP upgrades.

2. Cloud Mastery: Skillfully handling cloud-based upgrades, particularly in S/4 HANA and IBP, to ensure seamless transitions for our clients.

3. Technical Competence: Managing critical components such as Kernels, Connectivity agents, SAPJVM, Virus Scanners, Hostagents, and SAPUI5, ensuring the optimal performance of SAP systems.

4. OS Proficiency: Possessing a sound understanding of Linux and Windows(OS) within the context of ABAP and JAVA landscapes, facilitating smoother operations.

5. Problem Solving: Demonstrated expertise in troubleshooting SAP Systems, effectively resolving technical challenges to maintain high levels of customer satisfaction.

My skills extend to SAP HANA, SAP S/4HANA, SAP Integrated Business Planning (SAP IBP), Netweaver, and SAP Basis, making me a versatile professional capable of handling diverse challenges.

accomplishment_publications.name: Sensible Autonomous Machine using deep learning and convolutional neural networks

accomplishment_projects.title: Multimodal Emotion Recognition using Facial Expressions and Voice Cues
accomplishment_projects.description:
Recognizing and understanding emotions is crucial in human-computer interaction, as it can greatly enhance decision-making and judgment. In this project, I developed a comprehensive Multimodal Emotion Recognition System that focuses on analyzing candidates' expressions during behavioral interviews.

Key Features:
Facial Expression Analysis: The system analyzes candidates' facial expressions in real-time during interviews, providing valuable insights into their emotional state.
Textual Data Analysis: It also processes textual data from speech cues to gain a deeper understanding of the candidates' emotions.
Advanced Deep Learning: Utilizing state-of-the-art techniques like Bi-directional Long Short-Term Memory (Bi-LSTM) for textual content and Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) for facial expressions, the system ensures accurate emotion analysis.
User-Friendly Interface: Interviewers can access real-time emotion analysis through a user-friendly web interface, making the hiring process more efficient and insightful.

Usage:
During behavioral interviews, capture candidate's facial images and speech cues.
The system will analyze emotions and provide instant insights, assisting interviewers in making well-informed decisions.

Technologies Used:
Streamlit: A versatile Python library for building interactive web applications.
Docker: Containerization technology for seamless deployment.
CI/CD Pipeline: Ensuring continuous integration and deployment for efficient development.
Microsoft Azure: Cloud infrastructure for hosting and running the application.
Project Link: Multimodal Emotion Recognition System

Enhance your hiring process with the power of emotion recognition. Try it out today!
